frontmatter.title: IBM Event Streams Message browser
frontmatter.description: Messages (events) travelling through, are the core of the Event Streams (Kafka) concept. Following user feedback that our message browser consumed a lot of resources, we redesigned it to achieve the same value in a much lighter way.
